channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pot hole westbound on the Old Gloucester Road just before the building works.. Both my offside wheels wend down it with a loud bang. I need to get the car checked for damage. There is no way you can see this in the dark., 16th December
item.description:
This could easily break suspension or have a motorcyclist off their bike!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car park in a deplorable state, 16th December
item.description:
It's frustrating that places like this get so badly abused. Would it be possible for there to be a good clean up soon, repeated every few years?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Buckholt Road, Cranham, Stroud
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegetation needs removing to get original width of the path, 16th December
item.description:
See photos. Travelling into Cheltenham. Only one path is available. Recent works from the corner house at the end of Chargrove Lane with the A46 Shurdington Road. Workmen at this house took a shovel to the decayed vegetation on the path. It was removed in minutes. Now it's up to you to continue please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Only street lamp in carpark is permanently out, 16th December
item.description:
Only street lamp in Zura Avenue/Beamont Walk carpark is permanently out and has been for many months. This is dangerous at nighttime
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Zura Avenue, Upton St. Leonards, Stroud
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Significant amount of water pouring down Bushcombe Lane from a problem further uptake hill., 16th December
item.description:
This issue has been reported before by another member of the public. The flow has in creased dramatically and now is right across the road. If there is a drop in temperature the road will become treacherous and where the water crosses is on a bend. There is a serious chance of an accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bushcombe Lane, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Fence post blocking footpath, 16th December
item.description:
The field north of Coberley Court has problems on both boundaries where the public footpath has been blocked, or narrowed to an extent that makes access difficult.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Street, Coberley, Cotswold

item.title: Few pot holes on the road, 16th December
item.description:
The whole (hales close) road is quite cracked and potholed it looks like it needs to be redone!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Hales Close, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pot hole which is getting deeper every time it rains., 15th December
item.description:
Directly outside number 19 Clyde Crescent GL52 5QY

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 74, Clyde Crescent, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The entire strip off road is covered in deep potholes, 15th December
item.description:
The road leading to home farm and 2 other property’s leading from Brockhampton lane is completely covered in deep potholes and has been getting progressively worse over the past couple of years I myself have had 1 tyre repair and one tyre replacement due to the road being so bad and is only fit to drive 5mph. This road is used by lots of caravans as a business and holds horses and other live stock and it’s very uneven and unsafe for the trailers towing them. Please can you confirm when you will be able to review and repair this section of road as it’s not fit to high safety standards thank you I look to your reply
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole next to bus stop, 15th December
item.description:
Getting worse daily, lots of loose material around it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3-5, Bishops Drive, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole area needing attention, 15th December
item.description:
I have reported this area on numerous occasions and only minimal rrpairs have been carried out which bever last. Try driving over this area!!! This road is very busy and is the nain entry to an estste of 190+houses.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lime Court, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The road is permanently wet with shallow ponding - I believe that there may be a leaking water pipe under the road? Is it worth checking?, 15th December
item.description:
In Alma Road, Cheltenham, at the end of Florence Mews
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Florence Mews, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Cycle path cleaniness causing hazard to cyclists, 15th December
item.description:
Entire length of cycle lane on Charlton Hill/A435 hazardous. Decomposing leaf matter and twigs from trees causing a slippery surface of the designated cycle lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.title: The light doesnt flash - one of the two lights stays on, which doesnt highlight the 20mph zone at crucial times, 15th December
item.description:
Opposite the end of Winton Road in Warden Hill Road. It has been like this for at least 14 days - I pass it every day.

item.category: Sign isn't working correctly (part only or random activation)

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 15th December
item.description:
on the 10/12/2023 around 01:00 I had 2 tyers go on left side (Passenger side) after hitting the pot hole - Claim form sent out under ref 11445588
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking on the path, 15th December
item.description:
This is opposite the grangfield school in bishops cleeve. People park there damaging the grass and leaving it all horrible and muddy. Also I live on the Highgrove and Cars parked there completely block the view when trying to pull up to main road. I nearly had car crash. Maybe metal barriers will prevent people from parking. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Voxwell Lane, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegetation not cleared, 15th December
item.description:
The first house backing onto the footpath has cut some icy down at the back of the house, not cleared it away and it now obstructing the path.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 60, Mead Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping from builders, 15th December
item.description:
2 or 3 houses on Mead Road were having their retaining wall rebuilt which backs onto the footpath. Builders have only half finished the job and now deserted the site. Rubbish has been left behind. The path is ruined, too boggy and muddy to walk through. Evidence of fly tipping from photographs.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 56, Mead Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
